attributes.action: prevent medical researchers from creating human animal hybrid embryos
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We already have researchers destroying embryos during stemm cell and cloning research. Now they want to combine human and animal cells. Where are they going to stop if this is allowed? Haven't we done enough damage to ourselves and our world with out unwise tampering with things we do not understand fully?

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "prevent medical researchers from creating human animal hybrid embryos."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14866.asp
